medical_history.chief_complaint: Generalized abdominal pain that progressed to right lower quadrant pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began 5 days ago and localized to the right lower quadrant over the past 2 days. The patient was seen by her PCP who treated her for constipation, but the pain persisted. On the day of evaluation, the patient had diarrhea and chills but no fevers, nausea, vomiting, or dysuria.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthma, gestational diabetes, herpes simplex, atrial septal defect. Past surgical history includes a C-section.
